name: adidas Men's Swift Run 1.0 Running Shoes
product_description: Put an extra spring in your step with these men's adidas Swift Run shoes. An everyday go-to with classic appeal, these sneakers draw on heritage style. The lightweight knit upper has a supportive sock-like fit, and an EVA midsole adds cushioning. It all rides on a grippy rubber outsole.

name: Under Armour Women's Charged Assert 10 Shoes
product_description: These are running shoes anyone can wear to go faster—with Charged Cushioning® to help protect against impact, a breathable upper, and durability for miles. Lightweight, breathable mesh upper with synthetic overlays for added durability & support. EVA sockliner provides soft, step-in comfort. Charged Cushioning® midsole uses compression molded foam for ultimate responsiveness & durability. Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Offset: 10mm, Weight: 8.9 oz. Lace type: Standard tie. NEUTRAL: For runners who need flexibility, cushioning & versatility.
